solution_line_template: The original amount is ${full_amount} so half is ${full_amount}/{half_divisor} = $<<{full_amount}/{half_divisor}={half_amount}>>{half_amount}
{num_half_payers} students paid half (${half_amount}) for a total of {num_half_payers}*${half_amount} = $<<{num_half_payers}*{half_amount}={total_half_payers}>>{total_half_payers}
{num_full_payers} students paid the full amount (${full_amount}) for a total of {num_full_payers}*${full_amount} = $<<{num_full_payers}*{full_amount}={total_full_payers}>>{total_full_payers}
They were able to gather a total of ${total_half_payers}+${total_full_payers} = $<<{total_half_payers}+{total_full_payers}={total_gathered}>>{total_gathered}
